text: Murder by Death is a 1976 American mystery comedy movie directed by Robert Moore and written by Neil Simon. It stars Eileen Brennan, Truman Captone, James Coco, Peter Falk, Peter Sellers, Elsa Lanchester, Alec Guinness, David Niven, Maggie Smith and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1970s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American comedy movies
title: Murder by Death
